languages.text: The wearer gains +{uip|THP|4ebf0daf3a5d4b53b4d9323e3d3869a2} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} for each of their allies at full wounds at the start of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. languages.text: 装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，每有一名生命值全满的盟友，装备者便会获得{uip|THP|4ebf0daf3a5d4b53b4d9323e3d3869a2}点{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}临时生命值{/g}。 基础护甲特性：获得额外护甲，等同于{uip|Armour|4ebf0daf3a5d4b53b4d9323e3d3869a2}%。
